global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.
global.subtitle: Translation management

warning.browserNotSupported:
It seems that you are using a different browser that is not safe to be used for ATLAS.
ATLAS is supporting Chrome and Firefox browser â€“ please make sure you are using these.
warning.unsavedChanges: There is unsaved data that will be lost in case you log-out. Proceed anyway?

timeout.pending: Due to inactivity, your session is about to expire. You will be logged out at {{ logoutHours }}:{{ logoutMinutes }}. It would be a great idea to save your changes.
timeout.complete: You have been disconnected due to inactivity. Please login again into the application to continue using it.

noScope.noPermissions: It seems that you have been removed from all applications. Please contact your manager in order to be reassigned to a new application.
noScope.title: It seems that your selected scope has been updated or deleted. Please submit another one in order to use the application

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

register.noaccount: You don't have an account yet?

language.languageNameExists:
A market with the name {{ langName }} does exist already and cannot be created twice.
Please choose a diffrent name.
language.languageCodeExists:
A language short identifier with the name {{ langCode }} does exist already and cannot be created twice.
Please choose a different identifier.

confirmpassword.notMatch: Your confirmation password does not match yet!
confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 4 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

newpassword.minlength: Your new password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your new password cannot be longer than 50 characters.
newpassword.identic: Your new entered password was the same with current password. Please reenter the new password!

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

currentPassword.wrong: Your entered password was wrong. Please reenter your current password!

admin.jhipster-needle-menu-add-admin-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)
